005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import java.util.LinkedList;
009import java.util.List;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012
013/**
014 * Provides support for maintaining a set of Metaschema constraints.
015 */
016@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
017public class AssemblyConstraintSet
018    extends ValueConstraintSet
019    implements IModelConstrained {
020
021  @NonNull
022  private final List<IIndexConstraint> indexConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
023  @NonNull
024  private final List<IUniqueConstraint> uniqueConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
025  @NonNull
026  private final List<ICardinalityConstraint> cardinalityConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
027
028  @Override
029  public List<IIndexConstraint> getIndexConstraints() {
030    synchronized (this) {
031      return indexConstraints;
032    }
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  public List<IUniqueConstraint> getUniqueConstraints() {
037    synchronized (this) {
038      return uniqueConstraints;
039    }
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public List<ICardinalityConstraint> getHasCardinalityConstraints() {
044    synchronized (this) {
045      return cardinalityConstraints;
046    }
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public final void addConstraint(@NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint) {
051    synchronized (this) {
052      getConstraints().add(constraint);
053      indexConstraints.add(constraint);
054    }
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public final void addConstraint(@NonNull IUniqueConstraint constraint) {
059    synchronized (this) {
060      getConstraints().add(constraint);
061      uniqueConstraints.add(constraint);
062    }
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public final void addConstraint(@NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint) {
067    synchronized (this) {
068      getConstraints().add(constraint);
069      cardinalityConstraints.add(constraint);
070    }
071  }
072
073}
